title: Black Mamas Matter Alliance (BMMA)
description: A global non-profit focused on advocating for Black maternal health, rights, and justice.

title: National Association to Advance Black Birth
description: A non-profit organization focused on improving the birthing experience for Black women through advocacy, support, and programs.

title: National Birth Equity Collaborative
description: Creates solutions for Black maternal and infant health through training, policy advocacy, and community-centered collaboration.

title: Black Women's Health Imperative
description: The first non-profit created by Black women to protect and advance the health and wellness of Black women and girls.

title: Sistas Who Breastfeed
description: A program by the Perinatal Health Equity Initiative providing peer support for Black breastfeeding mothers.

title: National Black Doulas Association
description: Provides resources, networking, and support for Black doulas and expectant families.

title: Black Birth Equity Fund
description: Provides funding to help expectant Black mothers and birthing people access doula services.

title: Midwives for Black Lives
description: A collaborative movement that aims to improve birth outcomes by increasing the number of Black midwives.

title: Loveland Foundation
description: Provides grants to Black women and girls for high-quality mental health care.

title: The Shades of Blue Project
description: Offers mental health services and support for Black women during and after pregnancy.

title: D.O.P.E Mamas
description: Connects mothers with therapists trained in perinatal and postpartum mental health.

title: Therapy for Black Girls
description: A mental health initiative providing culturally competent therapy resources for Black women.

title: Melanin Mass Moms
description: A local and online group providing support, resources, and community for mothers of color.

title: Facebook Groups (Black Parenting)
description: Local and national Facebook groups providing peer support, advice, and community for Black parents.

title: The Bump
description: Provides articles and resources on pregnancy, parenting, and support for Black families.

title: Healthy Moms and Healthy Babies (HMHB) Program
description: Offers education on healthy pregnancy, breastfeeding, and parenting, along with referrals to local resources.

title: Natal Podcast
description: Features stories from Black women and families about their reproductive care experiences.
